duties_responsibilities.duty: Investigate complex and high-risk injury claims, consulting with police officers, medical professionals, claimants, and others involved in the accident.
Determine coverage, liability, and the total value of the claim using the gathered information.
Handle attorney-represented and claims with additional litigation features.
Report to the office about four days per month for important meetings, training, and collaboration.
Build rapport and successfully effect settlements.
Use discovery tools such as interrogatories, depositions, and production of documents.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in relevant field OR Associate degree with four years of relevant work experience OR Two years in claims handling and a bachelor’s degree OR Two years in claims handling and a relevant associate degree
